turns.speaker: SWITCH
turns.text: That's the third white van I've seen.

turns.speaker: CHOI
turns.text: Hallelujah!  You are my savior, man! My own personal Jesus Christ!

turns.speaker: NEO
turns.text: If you get caught using that --

turns.speaker: CHOI
turns.text: I know, I know.  This never happened.  You don't exist.

turns.speaker: CHOI
turns.text: Something wrong, man?  You look a little whiter than usual.

turns.speaker: NEO
turns.text: You ever have the feeling that you're not sure if you're awake or still dreaming?

turns.speaker: CHOI
turns.text: All the time.  It's called mescaline and it is the only way to fly.

turns.speaker: CYPHER
turns.text: You weren't supposed to relieve me.

turns.speaker: TRINITY
turns.text: I know but I felt like taking a shift.

turns.speaker: CYPHER
turns.text: We're going to kill him.  Do you understand that?  He's going to die just like the others.

turns.speaker: TRINITY
turns.text: Morpheus believes he is the One.

turns.speaker: TRINITY
turns.text: I... it doesn't matter what I believe.

turns.speaker: TRINITY
turns.text: If you have something to say, I suggest you say it to Morpheus.

turns.speaker: CYPHER
turns.text: I intend to, believe me.  Someone has to.

turns.speaker: TRINITY
turns.text: Are you sure this line is clean?

turns.speaker: CYPHER
turns.text: There's something about him, isn't there?

turns.speaker: TRINITY
turns.text: Don't tell me you're a believer now?

turns.speaker: CYPHER
turns.text: I just keep wondering if Morpheus is so sure, why doesn't he take him to the Oracle?  She would know.

turns.speaker: TRINITY
turns.text: Morpheus will take him when he's ready.

turns.speaker: CYPHER
turns.text: You are a beautiful woman.  Too bad things had to work out like this.

turns.speaker: CYPHER
turns.text: I'm tired, Trinity.  I'm tired of this war, I'm tired of fighting. I'm tired of this ship, of being cold, of eating the same fucking goop every day.  But most of all, I'm tired of this jagoff and all of his bullshit.

turns.speaker: TRINITY
turns.text: My God.  Morpheus.  You gave them Morpheus.

turns.speaker: CYPHER
turns.text: Yes.  You see, the truth is, Trinity, that we humans have a place in the future.  But it's not here. It's in the Matrix.

turns.speaker: CYPHER
turns.text: Oh, I disagree, Trinity.  I disagree.  I think the Matrix is more real than this world.  I mean, all I do is pull a plug here.  But there, you watch a man die.

turns.speaker: TRINITY
turns.text: But you're out, Cypher.  You can't go back.

turns.speaker: CYPHER
turns.text: That's what you think.  They've promised to back me, Trinity. They're going to reinsert my body. I'll go back to sleep and when I wake up, I'll be fat and rich and I won't remember a goddamn thing. It's the American dream.

turns.speaker: CYPHER
turns.text: Don't hate me, Trinity.  I'm just the messenger.  And right now I'm going to prove it to you.

turns.speaker: NEO
turns.text: I don't believe it!  I don't believe it!

turns.speaker: CYPHER
turns.text: Whoa!  Shit, Neo, you scared the Bejeezus out of me.

turns.speaker: NEO
turns.text: Do you always look at it encoded?

turns.speaker: CYPHER
turns.text: Have to.  The image translators sort of work for the construct programs but there's way too much information to decode the Matrix.  You get used to it, though.  Your brain does the translating.  I don't even see the code.  All I see is blonde, brunette, and redhead.  You want a drink?

turns.speaker: CYPHER
turns.text: Gee-zus!  What a mindfuck.  You're here to save the world.  You gotta be shitting me.  What do you say to something like that?

turns.speaker: CYPHER
turns.text: I'm going to let you in on a little secret here.  Now don't tell him I told you this, but this ain't the first time Morpheus thought he found the One.

turns.speaker: CYPHER
turns.text: You bet your ass.  It keeps him going.  Maybe it keeps all of us going.

turns.speaker: CYPHER
turns.text: Honestly.  Morpheus.  He got them all amped up believing in bullshit. I watched each of them take on an agent and I watched each of them die.  Little piece of advice:  you see an agent, you do what we do; run.  Run your ass off.

turns.speaker: CYPHER
turns.text: There was an accident.  A fucking car accident.  All of a sudden. Boom.  Jesus, someone's going to make a believer out of me.

turns.speaker: TANK
turns.text: Nearest exit is Franklin and Erie. An old appliance store.

turns.speaker: MORPHEUS
turns.text: I know.  They cut the hardline. This line is not a viable exit.

turns.speaker: MORPHEUS
turns.text: You have to focus.  There is a phone.  Wells and Lake.  You can make it.

turns.speaker: MORPHEUS
turns.text: We found him, Trinity.  We finally found him.

turns.speaker: TRINITY
turns.text: What if he isn't the One, Morpheus? How can you be so sure?

turns.speaker: TRINITY
turns.text: They'll be able to track it.

turns.speaker: TRINITY
turns.text: You can't use that until Neo is out!

turns.speaker: MORPHEUS
turns.text: I know, Trinity.  Don't worry.  He's going to make it.

turns.speaker: MORPHEUS
turns.text: Hello, Neo.  Do you know who this is?

turns.speaker: MORPHEUS
turns.text: I've been looking for you, Neo.  I don't know if you're ready to see what I want to show you, but unfortunately, we have run out of time.  They're coming for you, Neo. And I'm not sure what they're going to do.

turns.speaker: MORPHEUS
turns.text: Stand up and see for yourself.

turns.speaker: NEO
turns.text: What the fuck do they want with me?!

turns.speaker: MORPHEUS
turns.text: I'm not sure, but if you don't want to find out, you better get out of there.

turns.speaker: MORPHEUS
turns.text: I can guide you out, but you have to do exactly what I say.

turns.speaker: MORPHEUS
turns.text: The cubicle across from you is empty.

turns.speaker: MORPHEUS
turns.text: Good.  Now there is a window.  Open it.

turns.speaker: NEO
turns.text: How do you know all this?

turns.speaker: MORPHEUS
turns.text: There's a small ledge.  It's a short climb.  You can make it.

turns.speaker: NEO
turns.text: No way, no way, this is crazy.

turns.speaker: MORPHEUS
turns.text: There are only two ways out of this building.  One is that scaffold. The other is in their custody.  You take a chance either way.  I leave it to you.

turns.speaker: MORPHEUS
turns.text: This line is tapped so I must be brief.

turns.speaker: MORPHEUS
turns.text: They got to you first, but they've underestimated how important you are.  If they knew what I know, you would probably be dead.

turns.speaker: MORPHEUS
turns.text: You're the One, Neo.  You see, you may have spent the last few years looking for me, but I've spent most of my life looking for you.

turns.speaker: MORPHEUS
turns.text: Do you still want to meet?

turns.speaker: MORPHEUS
turns.text: Go the the Adams Street bridge.

turns.speaker: MORPHEUS
turns.text: Welcome, Neo.  As you no doubt have guessed, I am Morpheus.

turns.speaker: MORPHEUS
turns.text: I imagine, right now, you must be feeling a bit like Alice, tumbling down the rabbit hole?

turns.speaker: MORPHEUS
turns.text: I can see it in your eyes.  You have the look of a man who accepts what he sees because he is expecting to wake up.

turns.speaker: MORPHEUS
turns.text: Ironically, this is not far from the truth.  But I'm getting ahead of myself.  Can you tell me, Neo, why are you here?

turns.speaker: NEO
turns.text: You're Morpheus, you're a legend. Most hackers would die to meet you.

turns.speaker: MORPHEUS
turns.text: Yes.  Thank you.  But I think we both know there's more to it than that.  Do you believe in fate, Neo?

turns.speaker: NEO
turns.text: Because I don't like the idea that I'm not in control of my life.

turns.speaker: MORPHEUS
turns.text: I know exactly what you mean.

turns.speaker: MORPHEUS
turns.text: Let me tell you why you are here. You have come because you know something.  What you know you can't explain but you feel it.  You've felt it your whole life, felt that something is wrong with the world. You don't know what, but it's there like a splinter in your mind, driving you mad.  It is this feeling that brought you to me.  Do you know what I'm talking about?

turns.speaker: MORPHEUS
turns.text: Do you want to know what it is?

turns.speaker: MORPHEUS
turns.text: The Matrix is everywhere, it's all around us, here even in this room. You can see it out your window or on your television.  You feel it when you go to work, or go to church or pay your taxes.  It is the world that has been pulled over your eyes to blind you from the truth.

turns.speaker: MORPHEUS
turns.text: That you are a slave, Neo.  Like everyone else, you were born into bondage, kept inside a prison that you cannot smell, taste, or touch. A prison for your mind.

turns.speaker: MORPHEUS
turns.text: The pill you took is part of a trace program.  It's designed to disrupt your input/output carrier signal so we can pinpoint your location.

turns.speaker: MORPHEUS
turns.text: Have you ever had a dream, Neo, that you were so sure was real?

turns.speaker: MORPHEUS
turns.text: Your muscles have atrophied.  We're rebuilding them.

turns.speaker: NEO
turns.text: Morpheus, what's happened to me? What is this place?

turns.speaker: MORPHEUS
turns.text: More important than what is when?

turns.speaker: MORPHEUS
turns.text: You believe the year is 1997 when in fact it is much closer to 2197.  I can't say for certain what year it is because we honestly do not know.

turns.speaker: NEO
turns.text: Right now, we're inside a computer program?

turns.speaker: MORPHEUS
turns.text: What is real?  How do you define real?  If you're talking about your senses, what you feel, taste, smell, or see, then all you're talking about are electrical signals interpreted by your brain.

turns.speaker: MORPHEUS
turns.text: We have only bits and pieces of information.  What we know for certain is that, at some point in the early Twenty-first Century, all of mankind was united in celebration.  Through the blinding inebriation of hubris, we marveled at our magnificence as we gave birth to A.I.

turns.speaker: MORPHEUS
turns.text: Yes.  A singular consciousness that spawned an entire race of machines. I must say I find it almost funny to imagine the world slapping itself on the back, toasting the new age.  I say almost funny.

turns.speaker: NEO
turns.text: No!  I don't believe it!  It's not possible!

turns.speaker: MORPHEUS
turns.text: I didn't say that it would be easy, Neo.  I just said that it would be the truth.

turns.speaker: MORPHEUS
turns.text: Get some rest.  You're going to need it.

turns.speaker: NEO
turns.text: This is incredible.  I know kung fu.

turns.speaker: MORPHEUS
turns.text: Do you think my being faster, stronger has anything to do with my muscles in this place?

turns.speaker: NEO
turns.text: I know what you're trying to do --

turns.speaker: MORPHEUS
turns.text: I'm trying to free your mind, Neo, but all I can do is show you the door.  You're the one that has to step through.  Tank, load the jump program.

turns.speaker: MORPHEUS
turns.text: Do you know why you didn't make it?

turns.speaker: NEO
turns.text: Because... I didn't think I would?

turns.speaker: NEO
turns.text: If you are killed in the Matrix, you die here?

turns.speaker: MORPHEUS
turns.text: The body cannot live without the mind.

turns.speaker: MORPHEUS
turns.text: This is another Matrix simulation. A training program to help you get your sea legs and teach you one very important lesson.

turns.speaker: MORPHEUS
turns.text: No you don't.  Did you see the woman in the red dress?

turns.speaker: MORPHEUS
turns.text: Every attempt to fight them has ended in failure.  Only a handful of men and women have ever crossed an agent and lived because they are everyone and they are no one. Unkillable.  But now I believe that is going to change.

turns.speaker: MORPHEUS
turns.text: I've seen an agent punch through a concrete wall.  Men have emptied entire clips at them and hit noting but air.  Yet as powerful as they are, their speed and strength are but tethers to the rules of an unreal world.  Because of this, they will never be as strong or as fast as you can be.

turns.speaker: NEO
turns.text: What?  Are you trying to tell me that I can dodge bullets?

turns.speaker: MORPHEUS
turns.text: No, Neo.  I'm trying to tell you that when you're ready, you won't have to.

turns.speaker: NEO
turns.text: So is this the same oracle that made the, uh, prophecy?

turns.speaker: MORPHEUS
turns.text: Yes.  She's very old.  She's been with us since the beginning.

turns.speaker: MORPHEUS
turns.text: She would say she knows enough.

turns.speaker: MORPHEUS
turns.text: She is a true psychic.  She sees beyond the relativity of time.  For her there is no past, present or future.  There is only what is.

turns.speaker: MORPHEUS
turns.text: Don't think of it in terms of right and wrong.  She is a guide, Neo. She can help you find the path.

turns.speaker: MORPHEUS
turns.text: That I would find the One.

turns.speaker: NEO
turns.text: Morpheus, I don't think this is a good idea.

turns.speaker: NEO
turns.text: I told you I don't believe in this stuff.  No matter what she says I'm not going to believe it, so what's the point?

turns.speaker: NEO
turns.text: What do I believe it?  Are you kidding me?  What do you think?  I'm still trying to deal with the fact that everything I believed was real, wasn't.  The whole world, my entire life was a lie.  I don't know anything anymore, Morpheus.

turns.speaker: NEO
turns.text: Why?  So I can hear some old lady tell me, what?  That I'm this guy that everybody's been waiting for? The one that's supposed to save the world?  Come on.  How do I respond to that?  I can't.  It's ridiculous. I mean who am I?  I'm nobody, I'm just a guy.  What did I do, Morpheus?  Why me?

turns.speaker: MORPHEUS
turns.text: Faith is beyond the reach of whys and why nots.  These things are not a matter of cause and effect, Neo. I do not believe things with my mind.  I believe them with my heart. In my gut.

turns.speaker: NEO
turns.text: And you still believe I'm the One?

turns.speaker: NEO
turns.text: Yeah?  What about the other five guys?  The five before me?  What about them?

turns.speaker: NEO
turns.text: Did you believe in them too?

turns.speaker: MORPHEUS
turns.text: No.  I did not.  I have never told anyone this, Neo.  After I saw the Oracle I thought... no, I misunderstood what she told me.  I believed that it was all about me. That I would find the One, not that he would find me.

turns.speaker: MORPHEUS
turns.text: Listen to me, Neo.  I know why you're afraid to go through that door.  You can't get free of thinking that I could be wrong.  You must believe me.  There is a greatness inside of you, Neo.  A greatness that is going to lift you to unimaginable heights and that in time will change the world.

turns.speaker: MORPHEUS
turns.text: I know.  That is why it is so important for you to go.  Please, Neo, I'm asking you to find whatever respect you may have for me and trust me.

turns.speaker: MORPHEUS
turns.text: Trinity!  Go!  Get to the basement. Find the catch basin!

turns.speaker: NEO
turns.text: Morpheus, the Oracle... she told me --

turns.speaker: MORPHEUS
turns.text: She told you exactly what you needed to hear.  That's all.  Sooner or later, Neo, you're going to realize just like I did the difference between knowing the path and walking the path.

turns.speaker: TANK
turns.text: Ten hours straight.  He's a machine.

turns.speaker: TANK
turns.text: Now left and that's it in front of you.

turns.speaker: TANK
turns.text: Goddamn!  It's good to hear your voice, sir!

turns.speaker: TANK
turns.text: Got one ready, sir.  Subway.  State and Balbo.

turns.speaker: TANK
turns.text: I'm going to make the call.

turns.speaker: MORPHEUS
turns.text: He is the One.  He is the One!

turns.speaker: ORACLE
turns.text: I know.  You're Neo.  Be right with you.

turns.speaker: ORACLE
turns.text: Bingo.  Not quite what you were expecting, right?  I got to say I love seeing you non-believers. Always a pip.  Almost done.  Smell good, don't they?

turns.speaker: ORACLE
turns.text: I'd ask you to sit down, but you're not going to anyway.  And don't worry about the vase.

turns.speaker: ORACLE
turns.text: I said don't worry about it.  I'll get one of my kids to fix it.

turns.speaker: ORACLE
turns.text: You're cuter than I thought.  I see why she likes you.

turns.speaker: ORACLE
turns.text: So?  What do you think?  You think you're the One?

turns.speaker: ORACLE
turns.text: Okay, now I'm supposed to say, 'Hmmm, that's interesting but...' Then you say --

turns.speaker: ORACLE
turns.text: But you already know what I'm going to tell you.

turns.speaker: ORACLE
turns.text: Sorry, kid.  You got the gift but looks like you're waiting for something.

turns.speaker: ORACLE
turns.text: Your next life, maybe.  Who knows. That's how these things go.

turns.speaker: NEO
turns.text: Morpheus.  He almost had me convinced.

turns.speaker: ORACLE
turns.text: I know.  Poor Morpheus.  Without him we are lost.  We will never find the One.

turns.speaker: NEO
turns.text: What do you mean, without him?

turns.speaker: ORACLE
turns.text: Morpheus believes in you, Neo and no one, not you or even me can convince him otherwise.  He believes it so blindly that he's going to sacrifice his life to save yours.

turns.speaker: ORACLE
turns.text: You're going to have to make a final choice.  In one hand, you will have Morpheus' life.  In the other hand, you will have your own.  One of you is going to die.  Which one, will be up to you.

turns.speaker: NEO
turns.text: How do you know that name?

turns.speaker: TRINITY
turns.text: I know a lot about you.  I've been wanting to meet you for some time.

turns.speaker: NEO
turns.text: Trinity?  The Trinity?  The Trinity that cracked the I.R.S. Kansas City D-Base?

turns.speaker: TRINITY
turns.text: That was a long time ago.

turns.speaker: NEO
turns.text: I just thought... you were a guy.

turns.speaker: NEO
turns.text: Do you want to go somewhere and talk?

turns.speaker: TRINITY
turns.text: No.  It's safe here and I don't have much time.

turns.speaker: TRINITY
turns.text: Right now, all I can tell you, is that you are in danger.  I brought you here to warn you.

turns.speaker: TRINITY
turns.text: Please.  Just listen.  I know why you're here, Neo.  I know why you left your family and your friends, why you left your home to come to this city.  You're looking for him.

turns.speaker: TRINITY
turns.text: It's the question that brought you here.  You know the question just as I did.  It is a hacker's question.

turns.speaker: TRINITY
turns.text: When I asked him, he said that no one could ever be told the answer to that question.  They have to see it to believe it.

turns.speaker: TRINITY
turns.text: It's necessary, Neo.  For our protection.
